name: Free Games 2
description:
Free Games 2 is a collection of 11 games that you can play on your iPhone or iPod Touch online or offline. They are designed to be quick to play. Here's what you get:

Collapsing Blocks: Remove groups of blocks from the board to score points. Try to remove larger groups for more points and see if you can work it so that no blocks remain.

Match Three: Swap two objects to make a row of three or more. New objects fall from above. Try to keep it going as long as possible.

Deduction: Deduce a sequence of colors by making a series of guesses.

Minesweeper: Try to figure out where the mines are located by using logic.

Reversi: Play against the computer in this classic strategy game.

Maze Game: Find your way through a limitless number of random mazes.

Sudoku: This version of the classic numbers game features three levels of difficulty and limitless puzzles.

Jigsaw Puzzle: Assemble a picture by placing the pieces on the board. More than 700 pictures.

Sliding Puzzle: Slide 15 puzzle pieces around the board to assemble a picture. Can also play in a mode with numbers 1 to 15.

Video Poker: Try to get good poker hands in this quick game.

Word Search: Random dictionary words are hidden in a grid. Find them by tapping on the first and last letters. A new puzzle created each time you play.
